pony.SpeedLimit

Speed Limit for save TCP/IP stack or CPU.

type
class


Static Methods

nextTick(f : Void -> Void) : Void

parameters
f Function for run

Constructor

new(?delay : Int)
parameters
delay Wait time for next run. Set in ms. If -1 then run no wait.

Instance Variables

delay(default,setDelay) : Int

Wait time for next run. Set in ms. If -1 then run no wait.

Instance Methods

abort() : Void

Not run function after delay.

parameters
f Function for run
